adHeader: professional web design & web site maintenance service
adDetails: hello, My name is Kate and since 1999 I have worked at full time capacity in web design, mobile/desktop application design, e-commerce and social media design and development, NYC startups/non profit/fortune 500, Broadway & show biz, and most recently news & digital publishing. Freelance-wise, I have helped many artists and designers, small business owners and professional service providers create their self promotion web sites and working with the creative types is my favorite kind of work. I am available for project-based work as well as part time web site maintenance work (on regular basis if need be). Please visit my web site - http://www.katelevasseur.com/ My Etsy shop - https://www.etsy.com/shop/partoutdesign References & resume upon request. I am happy to answer any questions! Hope to hear from you soon! Thanks! Kate
